OOC: Well, I tried promoting it through my RPG, DBZSF, which has over 100 m=
embers. Did anyone join recently by any chance? Oh, wait. I better try some=
thing else, because apparently, the site isn't working anymore. Give me a m=
inute, I'll advertise it good...

  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: x=
_rauq_x 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Monday, December 10, 2001 8:=
57 PM
  Subject: Re: OOC


  That was... rather abrupt. Since another RPer =
with key characters 
  and such has just quit, the council (i hope they don=
't mind that i'm 
  speaking for them) is open to suggestions on what we sh=
ould do, 
  either just continues as if the characters/stuff hadn't existed=
, 
  finish off the IGL, restart the rpg, gah, i dunno... hit me with 
  so=
me stuff PLEASE.


  --- In nbwrpg@y..., KSLawdogg@c... wrote:
  > I quit. =
 Lost my "Hysteria" by Def Leppard album and that just 
  shoved me over 
 =
 > the line of anger and don't feel like putting up with this RPG's 
  crap=
.  No, I 
  > won't go into some gay story about my life in the RPG or anyt=
hing 
  else.  I 
  > quit.  Enough said.
